In many English families, people have four meals a day:
breakfast, Ilunch, afternoon teaand dinner.

milk.Lunch comes at about 12:30. Children usually have it
at school. They often have a sandwich with some drinks.
Afternoon tea is at about 4:00. It is _ usually a _ piece of
bread or cake with a cup of tea. Dinner is usually a big
meal. They have soup, fish or meat, and vegetables. After
that, they usually have ice-creams or something sweet.
